faculties_accepted: College of Engineering and Applied Science
module_restrictions: Exchange students may not take classes in Music, Law, or Education. Students who wish to take architecture, engineering, business or journalism at CU, should already have a background in those subject areas before coming to University of Colorado Boulder. Business and Engineering courses are often over-subscribed.
visa_info: For visa information, please refer to the following CU Boulder webpage: https://www.colorado.edu/isss/student-resources/admittednew-students/visa-and-immigration

accommodations_info.University Accommodation: Exchange student housing choices: University housing in apartments: the Bear Creek apartments can be a very good choice for exchange students. Bear Creek is run by the university and offers many social activities in addition to housing. Accommodation is in self-catering, ensuite apartments for students who are beyond their first year of university study. You apply as an individual and will be matched with roommates(s).  Although the normal contract is for 9 or 12 months, if you will only be here for a semester, Bear Creek will allow a contract for the semester only if space allows. You apply online. **Note that Bear Creek is not an option for exchange students for the 2021-2022 Academic Year.
accommodations_info.Off campus housing: we strongly recommend that students who wish to live off campus, arrive to find housing 1 - 2 weeks earlier than the date on the immigration document.
accommodations_info.Advice on housing: a good source of information about housing in Boulder can come from former or current exchange students.

cost_of_living.Estimated Monthly Living Expenses: For more information on the costs associated by attending CU Boulder, please refer to the following link. Please note exchange students will not be required to pay CU Boulder tuition fees.  https://www.colorado.edu/financialaid/cost/example-aid

location_cost_of_living: Text on cost of living in the city the university is in
location_weather: Text describing the weather of the city
location_halal: Availability of halal food options in the city
location_vegetarian: Availability of vegetarian food options in the city
